mapper.select: select m1.member_no as memberNo, m1.member_name as memberName, m1.member_profile as memberProfile, t.cat_first catFirst, t.cat_second catSecond, t.cat_third catThird, t.trainer_intro as trainerIntro, (select category_name from Professional_Category where category_no in (select cat_first from member m2 join Trainer t2 on (m2.member_no = t2.member_no) where m2.member_no = m1.member_no)) as catFirstName, (select category_name from Professional_Category where category_no in (select cat_second from member m2 join Trainer t2 on (m2.member_no = t2.member_no) where m2.member_no = m1.member_no)) as catSecondName, (select category_name from Professional_Category where category_no in (select cat_third from member m2 join Trainer t2 on (m2.member_no = t2.member_no) where m2.member_no = m1.member_no)) as catThirdName from member m1 join Trainer t on (m1.member_no = t.member_no)

select t.member_no as memberNo, trainer_intro as trainerIntro, cat_first as catFirst, cat_second as catSecond, cat_third as catThird, member_name as memberName from trainer t join member m on (t.member_no = m.member_no) where member_id= #{id}

select member_no as memberNo, member_id as memberId, member_pw as memberPw, member_name as memberName, member_nick as memberNick, zip, road_addr as roadAddr, det_addr as detAddr, card, enroll_date as enrollDate, member_level as memberLevel, gender, age, member_profile as memberProfile, email, expire_date as expireDate, phone, email_verification as emailVerification from member where member_id = #{memberId} and member_pw = #{memberPw}
mapper.update: update trainer set trainer_intro = #{trainerIntro}, cat_first = #{catFirst}, cat_second = #{catSecond}, cat_third = #{catThird} where member_no = #{memberNo}
mapper.insert: insert into bmi values( bmi_seq.nextval, #{memberNo}, sysdate, #{weight}, #{bone}, #{bodyfat}, #{bodywater}, #{protein}, #{mineral}, #{bmi}, #{bodyfatPer}, #{abfatPer}, #{metabolism} )
mapper.select: select * from( select rownum as rnum, m.* from ( select mapping_seq as mappingSeq, member.member_no as memberNo, training_cnt as trainingCnt, training_maxcnt as trainingMaxCnt, member_name as memberName, member_nick as memberNick, gender, age, member_profile as memberProfile, email, expire_date as expireDate, phone from member_mapping join member on(member.member_no = member_mapping.member_no) where trainer_no = 10 order by mapping_seq desc ) m ) where rnum between 1 and 10

select t.member_no as memberNo, trainer_intro as trainerIntro, cat_first as catFirst, cat_second as catSecond, cat_third as catThird, member_name as memberName, member_profile as memberProfile from trainer t join member m on (t.member_no = m.member_no) where t.member_no= #{_parameter}
select member_name as memberName, member_no as memberNo from member where member_no= #{memberNo}

select rownum, inbody_no as inbodyNo, b.member_no as memberNo, measure_date as measureDate, weight, bone, bodyfat, bodywater, protein, mineral, bmi, bodyfat_per as bodyfatPer, abfat_per as abfatPer, metabolism, (select member_name from member where member_no=#{memberNo}) as memberName from bmi b where member_no=#{memberNo} order by measure_date desc
select count(*) from member_mapping where trainer_no = #{trainerNo}

select inbody_no as inbodyNo, b.member_no as memberNo, measure_date as measureDate, weight, bone, bodyfat, bodywater, protein, mineral, bmi, bodyfat_per as bodyfatPer, abfat_per as abfatPer, metabolism, (select member_name from member where member_no=#{memberNo}) as memberName from bmi b where member_no=#{memberNo}
select category_no as categoryNo, category_name as categoryName from Professional_category
